official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to
		  provide for coverage, as supplies associated with the injection of insulin, of
		  containment, removal, decontamination and disposal of home-generated needles,
		  syringes, and other sharps through a sharps container,
		  decontamination/destruction device, or sharps-by-mail program or similar
		  program under part D of the Medicare program.

short-title.#text:
Medicare Safe Needle Disposal Coverage
			 Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Coverage of

			 decontamination/destruction device, or sharps-by-mail program or similar
			 program under Medicare part D
